dt: {bc}a {d_link|humanoid|humanoid:1} being {bc}a nonhuman creature or being with characteristics (such as the ability to walk upright) resembling those of a human

dt.t: Why do people respond so strongly to penguins? First, they stand straight and walk upright, like us, so we see them as little {wi}humanoids{/wi}—a convention of headwaiters, ten thousand nuns, plump babies in snowsuits.
Those tales of the deep blended narratives of voyages of exploration … with fantastic additions drawn from an ancient repertoire of sea monsters and mutant {wi}humanoids{/wi}.

shortdef: a humanoid being : a nonhuman creature or being with characteristics (such as the ability to walk upright) resembling those of a human
